## NS.getServerNumPortsRequired() method

Returns the number of open ports required to successfully run NUKE.exe on the specified server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getServerNumPortsRequired(host: Host): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  host | [Host](./bitburner.host.md) | Host or IP of target server. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The number of open ports required to successfully run NUKE.exe on the specified server.

## Remarks

0.1 GB
